# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show build status:

## Badge Code


![Desktop Build](https://github.com/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/workflows/Build%20Desktop%20Apps/badge.svg)
![Android Build](https://github.com/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/workflows/Build%20Android%20App/badge.svg)
![Check](https://github.com/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/workflows/Check%20%26%20Lint/badge.svg)
![Release](https://github.com/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/workflows/Release/badge.svg)


[![Release](https://github.com/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/actions/workflows/release.yml/badge.svg?branch=development&event=workflow_run)](https://github.com/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/actions/workflows/release.yml)

## Example Display

![Desktop Build](https://img.shields.io/badge/Desktop_Build-passing-brightgreen)
![Android Build](https://img.shields.io/badge/Android_Build-passing-brightgreen)
![Check](https://img.shields.io/badge/Check-passing-brightgreen)

## Alternative: Shields.io Badges

For more customization options:


![Desktop](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/build-desktop.yml?label=Desktop%20Build)
![Android](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/tyneitafrica/e-procurement-frontend/build-android.yml?label=Android%20Build)
